reviews.review:
延續經典的神作，
Half-Life的獨立資料片之一。
一名過慣好日子的陸戰隊士兵，和長官接獲了
『前往本傳的事發現場"黑山基地"消滅高登弗里曼並收拾殘局的』高層命令。愉快的前往任務現場，卻不斷的遭受外星生物的攻擊和阻擾，歷經千辛萬苦終於見到高登弗里曼，但只能遠遠望著他那橘色的背影，縱身一跳消逝在眼前。
憤怒的高層之情後，決定派出更精良的黑衣部隊來繼續執行殲滅行動，當然辦事不力的主角和其隊員也成為首要目標，為了活下去，主角必須解決往自己襲來的人事物。
Прикольно сделанный аддон на Half-life увлекательно и в некоторых моментах смешно хотелось бы увидеть эту историю как дополнение для Half-life 2
It's better than the original Half Life but it has less memes.  420/69

This is a really fun expansion as long as you go in for the mechanics only. Think of it as a really good version of the retro FPS formula. But I was expecting for some reason to get a satisfying story campaign as well, which doesn't manifest. Shephard isn't much of a character and all the events that happen are really big coincidences. You don't really feel like you're part of a marine unit send in to deal with the situation, or that your fellow marines have any value. This could have just been about a guy who was sent in solo to fulfil a undercover type mission. I find this unfortunate because, without an investing story, the really dynamic mechanics are left to dry. The great game-play could have been expanded a bit more to make up for the story. Still worth a buy if you're into the genre.

good

Continuation of a great story, though a bit bland to play through after I mistakenly played through HL2 before 1's expansion packs.  Movement is janky as ever, enemies spawn in predictable hordes, and the boss fight is somehow even worse than 1's.  Even though the gameplay is a bit lacking for what it could be, the further insight into G-Man and the military forces is well worth it.  6/10 gameplay, 10/10 story

thnak you

This was an absolute chore to play. I get that back in 99 this game was pretty insane for the time, but holy shit playing through it now is just not fun. I played on normal and was hardly ever above 50 health as health is so scarcely given to the player throughout the game, especially in areas where you're expected to fight a lot of enemies. There were like 3 instances of music playing in the entire game (one of which is in the credits). Everything was just so bland and uninteresting, a glaring contrast to the original Half Life. 

I hope Gearbox never makes another game. Oh wait...

I'm not sure there's a bad game in this series. Each and every one has been a joy to play, perfectly run difficulty (although this is maybe the hardest of all the HL games I've played so far), and more than worth the pennies I paid for it. There's an incredible ratio of pleasure to payment with these old games, and if you like the genre it's well worth an investment of your immersive hours.

Better of the two expansions for Half Life, adds a whole heap of new enemies and weapons to shoot them with, the eel alien that shoots green balls being my personal favorite toy. The addition of squadmates you can order around was a good idea but never really gets used beyond using said squadmates to accomplish a scripted objective and then leaving them behind. Pacing is good, never wears out it's welcome coming in at about half the length of the main game's campaign, took me about 5 hours playing on hard, compared to 10 for the main game. A must play if you are a fan of the Half Life series. 10/10

An excellent sidestory expansion for the original half-life. It seemed the perfect effort to capitalise on the huge success of that original game while adding a few well implemented elements itself. In general the game maintains a successful "same-but-different" approach to locales, enemies, and armaments. The pacing and design of the environments still pushes you forward, but now from the perspective of a marine, some of the deep atmospherics of the original have been supplanted with a layer of action schlock.  If you enjoyed the original, this one will likely satisfy you in the same ways and it won't take its time doing it. A sizeable game too, about 4-6 hours at a brisk pace, you can add to that a little on high difficulty.  recommended

[h1] Half-Life: Opposing Force. To trzeba ograć po Half-Life [/h1]
Wracamy do naszej, dobrze znanej placówki Black Mesy, ale tym razem jako Adrian Shephard, który jak reszta Rebelii ma za zadanie zneutralizować Gordona Freemana. Owa gra tym razem została zrobiona przez Gearboxa. Czy udało im się udało zdać test na godnego moda do Half-Life'a? 

Oczywiście, że tak. To jest ten sam, dobry, stary Half-Life, ale z inną fabułą i postaciami. Gra umie utrzymać klimat placówki, może nawet i lepiej niż oryginał, dzięki soundtrackowi, jak i dobrze zrobionych lokacji. Twórcy postanowili, aby powrócić to pewnych lokacji z pierwszej części, ale też dodali coś od siebie, co jest miłym dodatkiem od ich strony. Nie popełnili tych samych błędów co Valve podczas robienia lokacji, bo nie doświadczyłem, żadnego denerwującego momentu. Nawet po tylu latach gra umie wciągnąć mimo swojej starej mechaniki gameplayowej jaki i grafiki. Niestety wciąż jest denerwujące AI, które sobie postanawia nie iść dalej, albo tak po prostu nam strzelić kulkę w naszą głowę. Też lekkim minusem jest to, że gra jest niestety krótka (Ukończyłem w 4 godziny)

Один із аддонів до оригінальної Half-life. Це найбільше, найцікавіше і найоригінальніше доповнення до першої "Халфи". Грати будем за Шепарда, ще до того як він пішов рятувати галактику від Женців і до того як зрадив Америку в CoD:MW2.
Сам Геймплей представлений точнісінько так як і першій частині, проте тут завезли нову історію (доволі цікаву), нові рівні, локації, ворогів і босів. Події відбуваються паралельно подіям першої частини, що дозволяє поглянути на них трохи під іншим кутом. Доповнення розширює лор гри та поглиблює його. Відверто кажучи, Opposing Force є чудовим прикладом того, як варто робити ДЛС чи аддони.
Сувора рекомендація після проходження першого Half-life.
A great expansion to the original classic. Opposing Force features balanced difficulty that still manages to be challenging, a wider variety of guns and level design that's just as good.

bu inceleme spoiler içermez. Oynanış olarak half life den pek bir farkı yok ama farklı silahlar var ve bazıları cidden çok hoşuma gitti. geçen oyunda da yanııza mavi giğimli askerleri alabiliyoduk (galiba onlar blue shift deniyodu emin değilim) bu oyunda da biraz daha farklı bir sistem var telsiz var bağzı odalarda ondan asker falan çağırabiliyosun. bide 3 çeşit asker var: sıhhiyeci,kapıları kesen bir abimiz, ve taruzcu. training roomda bunları görünce heyecanlanmıştım oynanışı etkiler ve değiştirir diye ummuştum ama hikaye modunda bu askerlerle o kadar fazla karşılaşmıyoruz karşılaştığımızda da belli bir müddetten sonra bizimle gelemiyolar. onun dışında oynanış süresi iyi bence bir bir yan oyun için. ben  7 saatte bitirdim ama youtubede bir buçuk saatte bitirenleri de gördüm. bence half life paketini alıp oynamanız gereken bir oyun. benim için oyunun hikayesi half life dan daha etkileyiciydi aslında zamansal olarak half life 1 ile iç içeler ama birinin kendi başına çırpınarak hayata tununma hikayesi daha çok hoşuma gidiyor benim. Bu sebepten metro last light ın spider lair dlc sine bayılmıştım. ses kalitesi geçen oyunki kadar rahatsız etmedi beni ama yapay zeka pek bir gelişme gösterememiş. olsun yinede hala çok güzel bir oyun mutlaka oynayın.

Take that which transpired in the preceding entry, up the ante, discover just what can be done with, let's be frank, Valve's Quake-derived Spaghetti Code, and produce one of the finest expansion packs ever to compliment an already rightfully-acclaimed game.
